title: @Riot, are we ever going to get an OCE East and West?
body:
I know that we have a small player base but if the player base grew enough say, it doubled in size, would we get an East and West OCE server? My main point is that i live in Perth and get anywhere between 60ms-130ms in a game, but can lag alot sometimes. Compare this to Sydney where most people get around 10-30ms, its a clear advantage. Also, are you ever going to move your servers to Melbourne or Adelaide? They are more in the middle. 
https://www.google.com.au/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwie2P3in97MAhUEHaYKHdi4B-IQjRwIBw&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.goingrank.com.au%2Fgeography.html&bvm=bv.122129774,d.dGY&psig=AFQjCNGMyc84jjyBOmuhkgEiWqwD9SHFOg&ust=1463476182393756
as this picture clearly shows, australia alone, let alone the rest of Oceania is big enough to fit majority of europe in. And europe has a EUW and EUNE. you could do this with Ocenia, having a OCEW (Hosted in Adelaide) and an OCENE (hosted in Brisbane or somewhere in New Zealand)
